Literature.Title: Development of novel membrane active lipidated peptidomimetics active against drug resistant clinical isolates.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Kalanta A, Sonkusre P, Cameotra SS, Bisht GS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 0723(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli PGI/DML02292(MIC=10.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2295(MIC=4.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 3160(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus PGI/DML03149(MIC=12µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 2763(MIC=100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=15.5µg/ml),Candida albicans PGI/DML0109(MIC=15µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 2344(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 42203(MIC=10µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus IGMC/LM1/0336(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 64028(MIC=15µg/ml)
